title: 부사 도치 심화
description: Rarely, Seldom, Not until 등 복잡한 도치 문장을 연습합니다. ADVANCED-ADVERBIAL-INVERSION 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: Not until I read the report did I understand the issue.
Seldom do we see such dedication.
Hardly had we started when it began to rain.
learning_points: 복잡한 도치구조를 통한 시간 관계와 강조

sentences.en: Not until I read the report did I understand the issue.

sentences.kr: 그런 헌신을 좀처럼 볼 수 없습니다.
sentences.en: Seldom do we see such dedication.
Hardly had we started when it began to rain.

sentences.kr: 모든 준비가 완료된 후에야 발표를 시작했습니다.
sentences.en: Not until all preparations were complete did we start the presentation.
Rarely do such innovative ideas emerge.
Scarcely had we arrived when the meeting began.

sentences.kr: 결과를 받고 나서야 우리의 성공을 깨달았습니다.
sentences.en: Not until we received the results did we realize our success.

sentences.kr: 그런 완벽한 타이밍은 좀처럼 일어나지 않습니다.
sentences.en: Seldom does such perfect timing occur.
